item.description: 오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제풀이 병합정렬 def m_sort(a): if len(a) <= 1: return a center = len(a) // 2 right = m_sort(a[center:]) left = m_sort(a[:center]) return merge(left, right) def merge(left,right): global cnt n_right = len(right) n_left = len(left) i = 0 i_right = 0 i_left = 0 result = [0] * (n_right+n_left) if left[-1] > right[-1]: cnt += 1 while i_right != n_right and i_left != n_left: if right[i_right] >= left[i_left]: result[i] += left[i_left] i += 1 i_left += 1 else: result[i] += right[i_right] i += 1 i_right += 1 if i_left !
